knimeNode.name: GeniosPro Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads result files exported by the GeniosPro

intro.p: This node reads one or multiple result files of the GeniosPro (Tecan).
Files are grouped according to their file names, which are suppossed to follow the pattern: "$Barcode$.xls".

fullDescription.option: Select either several files within a directory or a single directory that contains GeniosPro files (subfolders will be used as well).
